Token.Abstract: The TICDSApplicationSyncManagerDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of a TICDSApplicationSyncManager object.
Informs the delegate that the sync manager has started the application registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager encountered an error during the application registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that was encountered.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the registration process failed to complete.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the registration process completed successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager has started to check for available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager failed to check for available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error related to the failure.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager didn't find any available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager found one or more available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: documentsArray
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSDictionary objects containing information about each available document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager has started to download a requested document that has previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager encountered an error during the document download process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that was encountered.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the download of a requested document has failed to complete.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that a downloaded store file file is about to replace an existing store file on disc.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Parameter.Name: aLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location on disc of the existing document that will be replaced.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the download of a requested document has completed successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Parameter.Name: aLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location of the downloaded store file.
